content: I think it might hurt a lot? Whatever, no time to lose! Let's watch the meteor shower together, yes indeed!

content: Mm—ooh! Superbly fitting attire for beholding the meteor shower! I love it! I shall dress this way, and with you... together... on time, we shall greet the falling stars! Mmm!
